text: Explored care repo and looked for issue that I can work on also discussed some possible upgrades for care container
Today I worked on Care Fe to add devcontainer config and started fixing test cases in care
I need to prepare for exams so not much for today just some minor stuff here and there.
created a minor PR on care_fe and another PR on care to add a new field for saving the creator of a user

EOD for 16th
created issues for outdated dependencies in care_fe
tried fixing some of them

Created a PR on care_fe and picked up an issue on the backend
https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/2391

Created a PR https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/772
Tracked the error in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/issues/2452
Tried to reproduce https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/issues/2422
created #777 to handle an integrity error
worked on a secret project üòÅ

Worked on https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/811

Reviewed some PRs
Nothing for today, worked on improving the performance of my laptop's kernel
Trying to debug a wierd issue with django

Created an epic to track dependency updates in care
And made a pr https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/836
Fixed issues with existing PR to add documentation build and deploy pipeline
@U02TB8XHZD1 has joined the channel

EOD 21/06/2023 ^@care_engineering

How did the day go?

‚Ä¢ Fixed issues on the staging deployment of django 4.2
‚Ä¢ updated boto3 to the latest version along with adding static type checking for boto3 in vscode
‚Ä¢ Had an onboarding call with Shahid along with @U02TDGQQPMJ and @U02T4HFA07Q
What's next?

‚Ä¢ Stabilize django 4.2 changes and get them ready for production

EOD 20/07/2023 ^@care_engineering
How did the day go?
‚Ä¢ Worked on refactoring notification handler
‚Ä¢ Reviewed and updated backend backend PRs to get them to mergeable state

Whats up next?

13th November
‚Ä¢ Refactored the nursing care enhancements pr #9079
‚Ä¢ Updated be dependencies for security fixes #2596
14th November
‚Ä¢ Made security enhancements to the backend Dockerfile and cleanups to the start scripts #2596
Currently working on
‚Ä¢ Making the integrations like sentry and plausible optional during build time so they are not bundled in environments where they are not needed, this would potentially reduce 1.2 mb of JS

18th November
‚Ä¢ Refactored the CSV export logic and converted it to a mixin class
‚Ä¢ Investigate the issue with slow api response in DigitalOcean deployment because of argon password hasher
19th November
‚Ä¢ Made flow diagrams and added more pages for store and Inventory management
‚Ä¢ Made sentry and plausible integrations on the frontend optional, so they are not bundled during build if not enabled
‚Ä¢ Searched for other places to make optimizations on the frontend
20th November
‚Ä¢ Worked on flow diagram for medicine dispensing in pharmacy and added details on partial dispensing
21st November
‚Ä¢ Created a new production branch on scribe backend and cleaned up the dangling branches and pr pr on care_scribe
‚Ä¢ Fixed a bug that broke asset actions which prevented video streams from loading
‚Ä¢ Started working on billing pages in pharmacy

22nd November
‚Ä¢ worked on getting cypress-parallel to run on github actions
‚Ä¢ added mochawesome reporter for cypress runs

25th Nov
‚Ä¢ made workflow changes for loading the database from db dump for cypress tests

No updates for 26-29th November as I was on leave
2nd December
‚Ä¢ Reviewed pending PRs
‚Ä¢ Checked for re-rendering issues on FE
‚Ä¢ Debugged the cache issue on the build workflows
‚Ä¢ Updated the test workflow to only upload db dump from develop branch in the backend

23 Dec
‚Ä¢ Made patient category optional for encounters
‚Ä¢ Updated the data migration to handle the array json fields

24 Dec
Whole day went into diagnosing the problem with my laptops built-in display
‚Ä¢ Worked on adding maintenance mode to django admin

20th Jan
‚Ä¢ Created migrations for patients and consultations to the new models
‚Ä¢ Created model/admin for tracking migration of fields that will need manual review after migrations

21st Jan
‚Ä¢ Refactored the migrations to separate files
‚Ä¢ Created migrations for patient_meta

30th Jan
‚Ä¢ Refactored the github workflows to reduce build times by 25+ minutes
‚Ä¢ Fixed caching issues in test workflows

June 24
‚Ä¢ Took intern interviews

June 25
‚Ä¢ added supplier field to service requests
‚Ä¢ updated scribe deployments for staging instance
‚Ä¢ reviewed PRs

June 26th
‚Ä¢ fixes to the suppliers field
‚Ä¢ added additional filters for labs endpoints
‚Ä¢ worked on migrations for investigations

27th October
‚Ä¢ Switched the parsing package for lab integration on the middleware
‚Ä¢ Reviewed backend PRs
‚Ä¢ Created release notes
28th October
‚Ä¢ Created fixtures for Availability, Queues, Inventory Categories.
‚Ä¢ Fixed issues with existing fixtures
‚Ä¢ Added healthchecks for db and redis services in backend docker compose
‚Ä¢ Added script to try to restore existing db artifact while running playwright CI

3rd November
‚Ä¢ Updated aws pipeline for teleicu.ohc.network to use the upstream repo directly and added approval steps to trigger builds only when needed
‚Ä¢ Tried to debug and fix the care image bulids for fe tests, partially implemented by 14164

Nov 4
‚Ä¢ Trimmed down playwright test CI by upto 6 minutes
‚Ä¢ Reviewed backend PRs

5th Nov:
‚Ä¢ deployed lab analyzer changes
‚Ä¢ seeded demo data for lab analyzer demo
‚Ä¢ made a frontend for mock analyzer

6th Nov
‚Ä¢ Made changes to the lab analyzer based on feedbacks

11th November
‚Ä¢ Documented a sample plugin for syncing users from an external idp
‚Ä¢ Created and tested migration script to migrate patient name identifiers
